document_data.name: Lamps by Watt
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lamps by Watt''' was a specialty shop found in the [[Temple District (Ravens Bluff)|Temple District]] of [[Ravens Bluff]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. They sold all manner of lighting fixtures and paraphernalia, including wall [[lamp]]s, [[chandelier]]s, [[torch]]es, [[sconce]]s, and [[lantern]]s. They specialized in items and fixtures made of [[brass]]. 

Highlighted by a bright yellow awning over the front entrance, this small and well-lit shop was quite prosperous among Ravenian home-and-land-owners. It had prime real estate, located on the corner of [[O'Kane Court]] and [[Hawk Passage]], within the [[Swordspoint]] neighborhood.
